definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
stable prices/commodity prices fixed by government (in a command economy)/to valorize (a commodity)

pinyin: dian4 zi3 wen3 ding4 cheng2 xu4

sentences.english: He won a few headers and calmed things down.
sentences.chinese: 赢得了几次头球争顶并且使情况稳定下来。

sentences.english: Whole body cast, rigid, and stable performance.
sentences.chinese: 机身整体铸造，刚性好，性能稳定。

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: Scuffing the ball, she says, disrupts the already turbulent external airflow.
sentences.chinese: 她说，将球进行打磨，来扰动不稳定的外部气流。

sentences.english: The frequency equilibrium is a particular case of the stable equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 频率平衡是稳定平衡的特例。

sentences.english: The air is rather unstable near the moisture frontal zone.
sentences.chinese: 同时有很强的湿度锋区，大气处于不稳定状态。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府却因为为人民带来了稳定和财富而深得民心。

sentences.english: The stability of colour and depth of shade were improved by after-treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通过后处理提高了热转印布样的颜色稳定性和深度。

sentences.english: Soybean isoflavones and procyanidins have be provided with reliable storage stability in Health Vino.
sentences.chinese: 大豆异黄酮与原花青素在保健酒中具有较好的稳定性。

sentences.english: The adaptive law using stability theory is derived.
sentences.chinese: 按李雅普诺夫稳定性理论设计自适应控制器。

sentences.english: They offer score systems or membership systems to consolidate the consumption group.
sentences.chinese: 积分制，会员制不断出台稳定消费群。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨过后相当长时间，滑坡才能恢复到雨前的稳定性。

sentences.english: Our goal is to create the greatest, and best M&M server.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标是打造最权威，最稳定的幻灵。

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平稳定是本地区各国发展的必要条件。

sentences.english: And it is vital to the stability of the region.
sentences.chinese: 稳定对于这一国家而言是至关重要的。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的热稳定性，抗强碱性及抗强溶剂性。

definition: to maintain/to keep up/to hold together
